document.masterDocTitle: Review of the Nearctic, Mexican and West Indian (Greater Antilles) species of Colliuris Degeer (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Odacanthini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the Nearctic, Mexican and West Indian (Greater Antilles) species of Colliuris Degeer (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Odacanthini)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Casnonia lioptera
Bates, 1891
: 265
. Type locality: «Atoyac, in Vera Cruz [ Mexico ]» (original citation).
Colliuris lioptera :
Liebke ( 1930 : 660 )
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material
. Bates originally described this species from an unspecified number of specimens. I have not seen any of the syntypes which are probably in BMNH .

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 19. Collection localities for
Colliuris lengi
(Schaeffer)
in the United States of America and Mexico.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Records .
United States of America
. ARIZONA.
Pima Co. :
Molino Canyon, Santa Catalina Mountains ( 1 , FSCA ). 8 mi . N Vail ( 1 , UAIC ). Madera Canyon ( 2 , FMNH , FSCA ). Rincon Mountain ( 1 , Blaine Mathison, pers. comm.). Brown Canyon, Baboquivari Mountains ( 1 , CMNH ). Santa Cruz Co.: Peña Blanca ( 157 , AMNH , CMNH , CNC , CUIC , FSCA , LACM , UASM , UAIC , UCB ). Peña Blanca Lake ( 1 , TAMU ). 2 mi . S Peña Blanca Lake ( 1 , CAS ). 3.2 km S Peña Blanca Lake ( 1 , TAMU ); 2.7 mi . above Peña Blanca Lake ( 1 , TAMU ). Peña Blanca Canyon, Pajarito Mountains ( 7 , AMNH , FSCA , UAIC ). Peña Blanca Canyon, Oro Blanco Mountains ( 4 , LACM ). Sycamore Canyon, Pajarito Mountains ( 5 , AMNH , FSCA , UAIC ). Rock Corral Canyon, Tumacacori Mountains ( 1 , UAIC ). 15.9 km WNW Nogales ( 1 , CMNH ). Patagonia Mountains ( 1 , CMNH ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Mexico
. " Mex " ( 1 , CMNH ). CHIAPAS. 16 km W Ocozocuautla ( 2 , FSCA , UASM ). 4.9 mi . N Frontera Comalapa ( 1 , UASM ). 32.5 mi . E Comitán ( 4 , UASM ). 31 mi . SE Comitán ( 1 , TAMU ). SONORA. 17 km SW Moctezuma ( 3 , UAIC ). 19.1 km S Moctezuma ( 5 , UASM ). 55 km SW Moctezuma ( 7 , UASM , UAIC ). 5.1 km NW Huicoché ( 3 , UASM ). Álamos ( 2 , CAS , UASM ). Nogales ( 1 , UASM ).
